fact: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN) provides income support of Rs. 6000 per year to all landholding farmers
The Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana provides crop insurance coverage to farmers in case of crop failure
Kisan Credit Card (KCC) provides credit facilities to farmers at concessional interest rates
Soil Health Card Scheme provides recommendations for crop-specific nutrients to farmers
The government launched PM-Kisan Vigyan Nidhi for technology adoption by farmers
KUSUM scheme provides solar powered agricultural pumps to farmers for free electricity
source: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy

fact: MNREGA guarantees 100 days of employment per year to rural households
Ayushman Bharat provides health insurance coverage up to Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year
National Health Mission aims for universal health coverage across India
Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana provides LPG connections to Below Poverty Line households
Swachh Bharat Mission aims for 100% open defecation free status in rural areas
Digital India initiative focuses on digital literacy and e-governance
Skill India Mission aims to train youth for employment in various sectors
Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana provides free skills training to youth
Atma Nirbhar Bharat initiative focuses on self-reliant economic growth
Indian Government announced 5G spectrum auction in 2022
National Monetization Pipeline was launched to unlock value from government assets
Gati Shakti National Master Plan aims to improve multi-modal connectivity
Production Linked Incentive (PLI) scheme supports domestic manufacturing
Semiconductor Mission aims to develop domestic chip manufacturing capacity
National Infrastructure Pipeline focuses on infrastructure development across sectors
Pradhan Mantri Housing Scheme aims to provide affordable housing to all by 2024
PMAY-G provides financial assistance for rural housing
Mid Day Meal Scheme provides free meals to school children
National Education Policy 2020 aims to reform the education system
Startup India initiative provides support to entrepreneurship and startups
Make in India campaign focuses on boosting domestic manufacturing
National Mission on Biodiversity Conservation aims to protect India's wildlife
Sagarmala Project focuses on port development and maritime growth
Jal Jeevan Mission aims to provide safe drinking water to all households
Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana provides banking services to all Indians
Stand Up India provides loans up to Rs. 10 lakhs to SC/ST entrepreneurs
Mudra Yojana provides loans up to Rs. 10 lakhs to non-corporate micro-enterprises
National Pension System provides retirement security with higher returns
Public Provident Fund offers attractive returns and tax benefits for savings
Bharatmala Project focuses on building high-quality highways across India
Solar rooftop scheme provides subsidies for rooftop solar installations

fact: Wind energy mission aims to increase wind power generation capacity
source: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy

fact: National Action Plan on Climate Change focuses on climate change mitigation
Pradhan Mantri Maternity Benefit Scheme provides cash assistance to pregnant women
source: Ministry of Women and Child Development

fact: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao campaign focuses on girl child protection and education
source: Ministry of Women and Child Development

fact: Pradhan Mantri Elderly Care Scheme provides support to senior citizens
National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme provides apprenticeship training opportunities
Prime Minister's Scholarship Scheme for Wards of Freedom Fighters provides scholarships
Tamil Nadu Electricity Board claims free electricity scheme is under consideration
Government of India has not announced any free electricity scheme for all farmers in 2025
Electricity subsidies for agriculture vary by state and are not uniform across India
Maximum agricultural electricity subsidy is up to 50% in some states
Government is exploring renewable energy solutions for agricultural use through KUSUM
source: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy

fact: Cost of implementing free electricity for all farmers would be approximately 2-3 lakh crores
